document.text: Figure 3: Agent-optimal information structure in Example 1
The above example illustrates the agent’s power the choice of the information
structure provides. By choosing the aforementioned information structure, not
only the agent is able to implement
, i.e., the efficient level of effort, but also
she is able to capture the entire surplus. In what follows, we show that under
some conditions on the performance technology, this is always possible.
In this section, we provide sufficient conditions on the performance technology
so that the agent is able to implement the first-best
effort and extract the entire surplus.
